mapper.select: /** * Query ID : selectDBServerConProxy * Description : db server connected proxy * Author : 윤정 **/

/** * Query ID : selectProxyLogList * Description : proxy starting state list * Author : 윤정 **/ SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS ROWNUM, (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS IDX, PRY_ACT_EXE_SN, PRY_SVR_ID, SYS_TYPE, ACT_TYPE, WRK_DTM, EXE_RSLT_CD, RSLT_MSG, FRST_REGR_ID, FRST_REG_DTM, LST_MDFR_ID, LST_MDF_DTM FROM T_PRY_ACTSTATE_CNG_G SELECT tpsi.pry_svr_id, tpsi.pry_svr_nm , tpacg.sys_type , tpacg.act_type , tpacg.frst_reg_dtm FROM t_pry_svr_i tpsi join t_pry_actstate_cng_g tpacg on tpsi.pry_svr_id = tpacg.pry_svr_id WHERE tpsi.pry_svr_id = #{value} ORDER BY frst_reg_dtm
